    Quantum Conference

    1 minute read

    Published: March 18, 2022

    List of international conferences which either have a quantum track, or where quantum papers can be submitted. Ranking is issued from CORE association.

    Rank A*

    Acronym Sub date Event date Name
    FOCS 30/07/21 07-10/02/22 IEEE Symposium on Foundations of Computer Science
    HPCA 30/07/21 02-06/04/22 IEEE Symposium on High Performance Computer Architecture
    ISCA 23/11/21 10-15/06/22 International Symposium on Computer Architecture
    PLDI 19/11/21 15-17/06/22 ACM-SIGPLAN Conference on Programming Language Design & Implementation

    Rank A

    Acronym Sub date Event date Name
    ISAAC 05/07/21 06-08/12/21 International Symposium on Algorithms and Computation
    ICS 04/02/22 27-30/06/22 ACM International Conference on Supercomputing
    ICCS 18/02/22 21-23/06/22 International Conference on Computational Science
    SC 25/03/22 13-18/11/22 International Conference for High Performance Computing
    HOTCHIPS 05/04/22 21-23/08/22 Symposium on High Performance Chips
    SCC 01/04/22 10-16/07/22 IEEE International Conference on Services Computing
    HiPC 04/07/22 18-21/12/22 International Conference on High Performance Computing

    Rank B

    Rank C

    Acronym Sub date Event date Name
    QIP Â  07-11/03/22 25th conference on Quantum Information Processing
